question: How does demand paging work in virtual memory systems?
answer: Pages load on-demand when accessed, not upfront.
diagram:
flowchart TD
    A[Page Access] --> B{Page in RAM?}
    B -->|No| C[Page Fault]
    C --> D[Load from Disk]
   D --> E[Update Page Table]
E --> F[Restart Access]
B -->|Yes| F
